Title: Alexander
Genre: Action, Biography, Drama, History, Romance, War
Writer: Oliver Stone, Christopher Kyle, Laeta Kalogridis
Actors: Anthony Hopkins, David Bedella, Jessie Kamm, Angelina Jolie
Plot: Alexander (Colin Farrell), the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.
Country: USA, UK, Germany, Netherlands, France, Italy, Morocco, Thailand
